articles.title: Highlights: Sunderland v Lincoln City - Sunderland AFC
articles.description: Ten-man Sunderland were left frustrated at the Stadium of Light on Tuesday night as Chris Maguire’s hat-trick sealed victory for Lincoln City on Wearside.
